title: K: Seven Stories - The Idol K
original_name: K Seven Stories ザ・アイドル K
ending_song: "Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!" by Yashiro Isana (Daisuke Namikawa), Kurou Yatogami (Daisuke Ono), Nagare Hisui (Kazuyuki Okitsu), Yukari Mishakuji (Masakazu Morita), Misaki Yata (Jun Fukuyama), Saruhiko Fushimi (Mamoru Miyano)
sinopse: Shorts featuring the characters reimagined as idols.
